page.title: 14A COUNTESTHORPE GHOST ?
page.content: One of Countesthorpe's more remarkable teachers is famous for alarming his class with {THE COTTAGE HOMES GHOST STORY: { }The story takes place on the land where Leysland High School is now, near the cottage homes which used to be an orphanage. No.8 was said to be haunted with the sound of children crying. It begins when a group of children camp in a field and a girl called Louise goes missing.The other children search for her and then the police are called in too.They find her name in red on the wall of No 8,but no sign of Louise. Six weeks later on a stormy night there is a knock at the door of Louise's parents house and standing in the doorway is {LOUISE.}Her dad asked her if she was okay and she replied- {AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH.
